thread.title: India says air force to have female fighter pilots by 2017

title: India says air force to have female fighter pilots by 2017
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
India's air force will have its first female fighter pilots by 2017, the Defense Ministry said Saturday. … Click to Continue »... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
